categories.lengthDescription: Convert between meters, feet, inches and other length units
categories.weightDescription: Convert between kilograms, pounds, ounces and other weight units
categories.volumeDescription: Convert between liters, gallons, cups and other volume units
categories.temperatureDescription: Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin
categories.areaDescription: Convert between square meters, acres, square feet and other area units
categories.speedDescription: Convert between kilometers per hour, miles per hour and other speed units
categories.timeDescription: Convert between seconds, minutes, hours, days and other time units
categories.pressureDescription: Convert between pascal, bar, psi and other pressure units
categories.energyDescription: Convert between joules, calories, kilowatt hours and other energy units
categories.powerDescription: Convert between watts, horsepower and other power units
categories.dataStorageDescription: Convert between bytes, kilobytes, megabytes and other data units
categories.fuelEconomyDescription: Convert between miles per gallon, kilometers per liter and other fuel economy units

contact.success: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you soon!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Welcome to our unit converter website, a platform built with passion and purpose.

welcome.title: Our Mission
welcome.content: Our mission is simple yet ambitious: to create the most user-friendly, accurate, and modern unit conversion tool available online.

understanding.title: Why We're Here
understanding.content: We understand that precise and efficient unit conversions are essential in many aspects of life, from academic studies and professional projects to everyday tasks.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: Unlike large corporations, we are a small, independent team driven by our commitment to serving our users. We're not just building a website; we're crafting a tool that we hope will make your day-to-day life easier.

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.content: We're deeply invested in continuous improvement. We actively collect feedback through user surveys and contact forms to make our platform more efficient and user-friendly.

features.fastDescription: Get instant conversions with real-time calculations
features.multiPlatformDescription: Access from any device, anywhere, anytime
features.multiLanguageDescription: Use the converter in your preferred language

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our website.
terms.effectiveDate: These terms are effective as of January 1, 2024

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using this website, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this document. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the site.

usage.title: Use of the Website
usage.content: You may use this website for personal and non-commercial purposes only. You agree not to use the site in any way that may damage, disable, or impair its functionality.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of our website and is protected by intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: This website is provided 'as is' without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the content provided.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not responsible for any damages arising from your use of the website, including direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

links.title: External Links
links.content: Our website may include links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of these external sites.

modifications.title: Modifications to the Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which we operate.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it.
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We do not require or collect any personal information from users to access our website. We may collect non-identifiable information such as browser type, device type, and IP address.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance site performance and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party tools and analytics services to understand site usage. This information is anonymized and used only to improve the website.

updates.title: Changes to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements.
